name: Intro
_source: # Battle where you destroy Clotho's artifact
# Need to have recruited Mitzi and beaten the precursor ruins to get here.
s;Simon;Stand aside.{w} I won't allow the Fates' reign of terror to continue.
s;Annetta;You are blessed by her, Simon! What heresy is this?
s;Simon;Her gift does not give her to the right to control me, or anyone else.|I'm done being her pawn.
s;Annetta;...Very well.|Simon.|I, too, am blessed by Clotho.
s;Annetta;While I yet stand, you will not defile this shrine.
s;Annetta;If I fall, our battle will simply begin anew.|I will give my eternity for Lady Clotho.|Prepare yourself.
